channel.title: Symplistik's Podcast Page
channel.itunes:subtitle: Check it Out & Give it a listen!
channel.itunes:author: symplistik

item.title: Etana Interview with The Get Up
item.description: While in Bermuda touring, Etana takes time out of her busy schedule to check in with the crew at The Get Up. In this episode we talk about her new single I am Strong, her musical journey, and much more. Sit back relax and enjoy!! Track listing coming soon.....
item.dc:creator: symplistik
item.itunes:summary:
While in Bermuda touring, Etana takes time out of her busy schedule to check in with the crew at The Get Up. In this episode we talk about her new single I am Strong, her musical journey, and much more. Sit back relax and enjoy!!
Track listing coming soon.....

item.title: LFL MVP Amber Reed interview with The Get Up
item.description: Lingerie Bowl IX champion and MVP Amber Reed of the Los Angeles Temptation checks in with the crew to talk about football, wardrobe malfunctions, and much more. This is a must on the download list!! Share, Download and most of all Enjoy.. Peace
item.dc:creator: symplistik
item.itunes:summary:
Lingerie Bowl IX champion and MVP Amber Reed of the Los Angeles Temptation checks in with the crew to talk about football, wardrobe malfunctions, and much more. This is a must on the download list!!
Share, Download and most of all Enjoy..
Peace

item.title: Noel Gourdin Interview with The Get Up
item.description: On the eve of Super Bowl XLVI, R&B crooner Noel Gourdin checks in with Symplistik and Doobs to talk about football, his album Fresh the definition, healing relationships and much more. This is an episode not to be missed. Download, Share and most of all Enjoy. Tracklisting Beautiful Noel Gourdin Interview Not Around Noel Gourdin Interview Puppet
item.dc:creator: symplistik
item.itunes:summary:
On the eve of Super Bowl XLVI, R&B crooner Noel Gourdin checks in with Symplistik and Doobs to talk about football, his album Fresh the definition, healing relationships and much more. This is an episode not to be missed.
Download, Share and most of all Enjoy.

Noel Gourdin Interview

item.title: Kevin Lyttle Interview with The Get Up
item.description: Caribbean mega star Kevin Lyttle checks in with Doobs and Symplistik to talk about his new singles Wine and Go Down and Hot girls and Alcohol. They also talk about his new record label, dance central 2 and much more. This is an episode not to be missed. Download, Share and most of all Enjoy!!!

item.title: Scholarich Interview with The Get Up
item.description: Brooklyn based recording group Scholarich stops by the studio to chat with the Get Up crew. This interview is a must on the check out list! Listen as they talk about their music, clothing line, student foundation and much more! Download, Share and Most of all enjoy!! Tracklist Scholarich Interview Money Meech - Follow Me Scholarich Interview Money Meech ft.Isleema SongBird - Dreams Scholarich Interview

item.title: Color Heritage Apparel CEO Winston Jack Interview with The Get Up
item.description: Color Heritage Apparel owner Winston Jack Chops it up with Symplistik & Doobs to talk about fashion, politics and more. This episode is one for the books, Check it out!!! Also log on to www.colorheritage.com to check out the latest styles and fashion trends set by Color Heritage Apparel. "IT'S ABOUT YOU AND YOUR CULTURE, REP YOUR HERITAGE" *part 2 of this interview coming soon* stay tuned

item.title: Maybach Music Group (MMG) Reggae Artist Magazeen Interview
item.description: Maybach Music group recording artist Magazeen checks in with the Get Up to talk about his new singles, how he met up with Rick Ross to become the first reggae artist on his label and more. Download, Stream and Enjoy Log on to www.onecaribbeanradio.com or 97.9hd2 fm in the nyc area Saturday Mornings from 10am - 2pm (est) to tune into "The Get Up" Tracklisting Magazeen Interview Immigrant 7'11 ft Rick Ross Ride

item.title: Symplistik & Dj NessDigi presents "Just A Little Bit"
item.description: This is a mix of Dj Symplistik & NessDigi going head to head in studio.. They play hits from 50cent, Brandy, Take 6, Akon, Styles P, Earth, Wind, & Fire and many more. Something So Sweet and Enjoyable for you I-pod, House, Car, Workplace etc. Download and share it with your friends!!!!

item.title: THE CURTAIN CALL HR 1. (march 30, 08)
item.description: TUNE IN EACH & EVERY SUNDAY NIGHT FROM 9PM TO 12AM TO LISTEN TO WHAT GOES DOWN ON " THE CURTAIN CALL" BROADCASTING LIVE FROM NEW YORK CITY So Tune In To Vybz Radio 107.1fm in the new york city area or www.ourvybz.com TrackListing Recap (march 30,08) 1. Ce Ce Peniston - Finally 2. Ce Ce Peniston - We Got A Love Thang 3. Cybil Jefferies - Love So Special 4. CC Music Factory - Gonna Make You Sweat 5. AL Y-US - Follow Me 6. Lionel Richie - All Night Long (Lionel On Vinyl Remix) 7. Royksopp - Remind Me 8. Bob Sinclar - Love Generation 9. Junior X - Plead My Cause 10. Bitty Mclean - Walk Away 11. Mr. Vegas - Do You Know 12. Da' Ville - On My Mind 13. I-Sasha - Don't You Know 14. Richie Spice - Brown Skin 15. Pressure - Love & Affection 16. Tarrus Riley - She's Royal

item.title: Is This What They Call Conscious Hip Hop!! You Tell Me!!
item.description: Now This Is What I'm Talking About When I Mean Hip Hop Music!!!!!!!!! "Symplistik Gives Us, His Rendition On What HipHop Music Means To Him!!! Classic, Soulful, Meaningful & Peaceful! "Good Hip Hop Music". (the shit radio stations are lacking to play!!! lol.) excuse my English people!!. I'm A Little Vex Here Can't You Tell lol!!!! So Sit Back, Relax @ Enjoy!! Tracklisting 1. Pharoache Monch - So Good 2. Common -Break My Heart 3. Talib Kweli - Soon The New Day 4. Dj Jazzy Jeff FT. C.L Smooth - All I Know 5. Sean Price ft. Steele (Smif N Wessun) - Oops Upside Your Head 6. PolyRythym Addicts FT. Large Professor - The Purist 7. Talib Kweli - In The Mood 8. J. Dilla ft. Guilty Simpson & Madlib - Baby 9. Common ft. Dangelo -So Far To Go. 10.Pharoache Monch ft. Erykah Badu - Hold On You Know How It Goes, Download IT, Enjoy It & Most Of All Share It!!!!! Look Out For The "Simply Symplistik Mixtape" Series Coming To The Internet Near You................ Please Leave Ya Comments & Feed Back For Your Boy To Know Whats Up!!! FOR MORE INFO ABOUT SYMPLISTIK LOG ON TO www.myspace.com/symplistik OR www.myspace.com/essentialsoundsinc Peace & Blessing Symplistik
